code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='/api/routine-templates';const routineTemplateService={createTemplate:async data=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const res=await axios.post(API_URL,data,{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});return res.data;},getTemplates:async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const res=await axios.get(API_URL,{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});return res.data;},assignTemplate:async(templateId,patientId)=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const res=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/${templateId}/assign`,{patientId},{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});return res.data;},getAssignments:async patientId=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const params=patientId?{patientId}:{};const res=await axios.get(`${API_URL}/assignments`,{params,headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});return res.data;},updateAssignment:async(id,data)=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const res=await axios.put(`${API_URL}/assignments/${id}`,data,{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});return res.data;}};export default routineTemplateService;
